negotiator.boaframework.offeringstrategy.anac2012

Class BRAMAgent2_Offering

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.boaframework.BOA
      • negotiator.boaframework.OfferingStrategy
        • negotiator.boaframework.offeringstrategy.anac2012.BRAMAgent2_Offering

  • public class BRAMAgent2_Offering
extends OfferingStrategy
    This is the decoupled Bidding Strategy of AgentLG For the opponent model extension a range of bids is found near the target utility. The opponent model strategy uses the OM to select a bid from this range of bids. DEFAULT OM: None
    Author:
    Alex Dirkzwager
